definition: overweight from overwork (the supposition that white collar workers become fat as a consequence of factors associated with being under pressure at work, including irregular diet, lack of exercise and inadequate rest)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
